Welcome! This guide will help you get VoiceCapacitor running on your iPhone.

## Prerequisites Checklist

Before you start, make sure you have:

- [ ] macOS computer
- [ ] Xcode 14+ installed
- [ ] iPhone with iOS 15+
- [ ] USB cable
- [ ] Apple ID (free account works)
- [ ] Node.js 18+ installed
- [ ] CocoaPods installed (or install during setup)

Don't have everything? The `setup.sh` script will help you!
